channel.title: [508] Partyhat glitch
channel.description:
I've tried using the search bar, didn't help.
The problem is that when you wear a Partyhat (of any color) it appears on your character, but the color seems to be kind of off.
The thing is, your Partyhat turns into kind of a 'Dull green' color when you wear it, and I was wondering if anyone could point me in the right direction of where to look/fix this problem?
*Edit: I'm using Palidino76's base.

item.title: [508] Partyhat glitch
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Project Evolution:

Try it’s int’s. Im guessing you would find it there. If not, then simply recolour the item.

Okay, thanks, I’ll check into it, and see what I can do.

Read full topic
